thread.section_title: NavePoint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NavePoint | navepoint.com | 2 of 7
thread.title: Mehul

author: Mehul
title: Mehul
text:
I purchased something and FedEx was being a potato and they marked the item as delivered, but I never got it. NavePoint customer service was very helpful in communication updates with me. After waiting for FedEx for couple weeks, NavePoint refunded me the money so that I don't have to wait on FedEx to resolve my issue.
I am extremely pleased with their customer service and will purchase from them again. I will also recommend them to my friends.
Keep up the good work!
-Mehul
